content:
ESRI stands for Environmental Systems Research Institute, a company that provides software and services for geographic information systems (GIS) and mapping technology. ESRI compliance, therefore, does not directly relate to 401k retirement savings plans.

It is possible that the entity responsible for administering the 401k plan, such as an employer or a third-party administrator, may use ESRI software or technology to manage the plan. In this case, ESRI compliance may refer to the plan's adherence to certain standards or requirements for using ESRI software or technology.

However, without more context or information, it is difficult to determine what ESRI compliance specifically means in the context of a 401k retirement savings plan.
